Hedge_text: (Racial Groups[MeSH] OR Ethnic and Racial Minorities[MeSH] OR "population groups"[TIAB] OR "population group"[TIAB] OR Multi-racial[TIAB] OR multiracial[TIAB] OR "Multiple races"[TIAB] OR "Multiple race"[TIAB] OR "Mixed race"[TIAB] OR "Mixed races"[TIAB] OR Bi-racial[TIAB] OR biracial[TIAB] OR Interacial[TIAB] OR "American Indian"[TIAB] OR "Alaska Natives"[TIAB] OR "American Indians"[TIAB] OR "Alaska Native"[TIAB] OR "Indigenous Population"[TIAB] OR "Indigenous Populations"[TIAB] OR "First Nations"[TIAB] OR "Mongoloid Race"[TIAB] OR "Mongoloid Races"[TIAB] OR "Asiatic Race"[TIAB] OR "Asiatic Races"[TIAB] OR "African American"[TIAB] OR "African Americans"[TIAB] OR African-Americans[TIAB] OR African-American[TIAB] OR "Black American"[TIAB] OR "Black Americans"[TIAB] OR Afro-American[TIAB] OR Afro-Americans[TIAB] OR "African ancestry"[TIAB] OR "Australoid Race"[TIAB] OR "Australian Race"[TIAB] OR "Australian Races"[TIAB] OR "Caucasoid Race"[TIAB] OR "Caucasoid Races"[TIAB]) OR ("Health Disparity, Minority and Vulnerable Populations"[Mesh] OR "Ethnicity"[Mesh] OR "people of color" OR "people of colour" OR "BIPOC" OR "Black, Indigenous and People of Color" OR "men of color" OR "women of color" OR "women of colour" OR "ethnic group"[TIAB] OR "ethnic groups"[TIAB] OR "ethnic inequalities"[TIAB] OR "ethnic inequality"[TIAB] OR "ethnic population"[TIAB] OR "ethnic populations"[TIAB] OR latine[TIAB] OR latinx[TIAB] OR "race and ethnicity"[TIAB] OR "racial and ethnic minorities" OR "racial minority"[TIAB] OR "ethnic minority"[TIAB] OR "racial and ethnic minority"[TIAB] OR "racial minorities"[TIAB] OR "ethnic minorities"[TIAB] NOT "Sexual and Gender Minorities"[Mesh])

("Sexual and Gender Minorities"[Mesh] OR "Homosexuality"[Mesh] OR "Bisexuality"[Mesh] OR "Gender Dysphoria"[Mesh] OR "Sexual and Gender Disorders"[Mesh] OR "Transgender Persons"[Mesh] OR "Health Services for Transgender Persons"[Mesh] OR "Transsexualism"[Mesh] OR "Disorders of Sex Development"[Mesh] OR same sex[tw] OR homosexual*[tw] OR homo-sexual*[tw] OR bisexual*[tw] OR bi-sexual*[tw] OR pansexual*[tw] OR asexual*[tw] OR lesbian*[tw] OR gay[tw] OR queer[tw] OR genderqueer*[tw] OR gender-queer*[tw] OR gender divers*[tw] OR gender-fluid[tw] OR genderfluid[tw] OR transgender*[tw] OR trans-gender*[tw] OR trans man[tw] OR trans men[tw] OR trans woman[tw] OR trans women[tw] OR trans persons[tw] OR trans people[tw] OR transmasculine[tw] OR trans-masculine[tw] OR transfeminine[tw] OR trans-feminine[tw] OR assigned male[tw] OR male assigned[tw] OR male assignment[tw] OR assigned female[tw] OR female assigned[tw] OR female assignment[tw] OR affirmed gender[tw] OR nonbinary[tw] OR non-binary[tw] OR two spirit[tw] OR transsexual*[tw] OR trans-sexual*[tw] OR intersex*[tw] OR inter-sex*[tw] OR agender[tw] OR cisgender*[tw] OR cis-gender*[tw] OR (("Sexuality"[Mesh:noexp] OR "Gender Identity"[Mesh] OR gender*[tw] OR sexual*[tw]) AND ("Minority Groups"[Mesh] OR minorit*[tw] OR identit*[tw] OR identified[tw] OR identification[tw] OR nonconform*[tw] OR non-conform*[tw] OR reassign*[tw] OR re-assign*[tw] OR discord*[tw] OR affirm*[tw] OR orient*[tw] OR incongru*[tw] OR disharmony[tw])) OR "sex with men"[tw] OR "men who have sex with"[tw] OR "men having sex with men"[tw] OR same-gender-loving[tw] OR MSM[tw] OR LGB[tw] OR LGBT*[tw] OR GLBT*[tw] OR AMAB[tw] OR AFAB[tw] OR MTF[tw] OR M2F[tw] OR FTM[tw] OR F2M[tw])

("Pediatrics"[Mesh] OR "Infant"[Mesh] OR "Infant Health"[Mesh] OR "Child"[Mesh] OR "Child, Hospitalized"[Mesh] OR "Child Health"[Mesh] OR "Child Health Services"[Mesh] OR "Adolescent"[Mesh] OR "Minors"[Mesh] OR "Adolescent, Hospitalized"[Mesh] OR "Adolescent Health"[Mesh] OR "Adolescent Medicine"[Mesh] OR "Adolescent Health Services"[Mesh] OR pediatric[tiab] OR paediatric[tiab] OR pediatrics[tiab] OR paediatrics[tiab] OR premature[tiab] OR prematurity[tiab] OR preterm[tiab] OR pre-term[tiab] OR newborn[tiab] OR newborns[tiab] OR neonate[tiab] OR neonates[tiab] OR neonatal[tiab] OR perinatal[tiab] OR peri-natal[tiab] OR infant[tiab] OR infants[tiab] OR infantile[tiab] OR infancy[tiab] OR baby[tiab] OR babies[tiab] OR toddler[tiab] OR toddlers[tiab] OR child[tiab] OR children[tiab] OR childhood[tiab] OR preschool[tiab] OR pre-school[tiab] OR schoolage[tiab] OR school age[tiab] OR schoolaged[tiab] OR school aged[tiab] OR schoolchild[tiab] OR schoolchildren[tiab] OR pubescent[tiab] OR pubescents[tiab] OR pubescence[tiab] OR prepubescent[tiab] OR prepubescents[tiab] OR prepubescence[tiab] OR adolescent[tiab] OR adolescents[tiab] OR adolescence[tiab] OR juvenile[tiab] OR juveniles[tiab] OR preteen[tiab] OR preteens[tiab] OR teen[tiab] OR teens[tiab] OR teenager[tiab] OR teenagers[tiab] OR teenage[tiab] OR teenaged[tiab] OR underage[tiab] OR under age[tiab] OR underaged[tiab] OR under aged[tiab] OR youth[tiab] OR youths[tiab] OR boy[tiab] OR boys[tiab] OR boyhood[tiab] OR girl[tiab] OR girls[tiab] OR girlhood[tiab])

("Aged"[Mesh] OR "Aged"[Mesh] OR "Geriatric Assessment"[Mesh] OR "Geriatrics"[Mesh] OR "Geriatric Psychiatry"[Mesh] OR "Geriatric Dentistry"[Mesh] OR "geriatric nursing"[Mesh] OR "Dental Care For Aged"[Mesh] OR "Homes For The Aged"[Mesh] OR "Frail Elderly"[Mesh] OR "Housing for the Elderly" [MeSH] OR aged[tiab] OR elder[tiab] OR elders[tiab] OR [tiab] OR mature[tiab] OR senior[tiab] OR seniors[tiab] OR agedness[tiab] OR geriatric[tiab])

(("Women's health"[Mesh] OR "women's health services"[Mesh] OR "women"[Mesh] OR girl[tiab] OR girls[tiab] OR women[tiab] OR woman[tiab] OR female[tiab] OR females[tiab] OR widow[tiab] OR widows[tiab] OR wife[tiab] OR wives[tiab] OR mother[tiab] OR mothers[tiab] OR aunt[tiab] OR aunts[tiab] OR daughter[tiab] OR daughters[tiab] OR grandmother[tiab] OR grandmothers[tiab] OR niece[tiab] OR nieces[tiab] OR feminine[tiab] OR feminity[tiab] OR lady[tiab] OR ladies[tiab] OR homemaker[tiab] OR homemakers[tiab] OR housewife[tiab] OR housewives[tiab] OR she[tiab] OR her[tiab] OR hers[tiab]) AND "Humans" [MeSH])
